trans-unit.source: I need help troubleshooting Code Search
trans-unit.target: I need help troubleshooting Code Search

trans-unit.source:
By using Code Search you can:
  • Search across all of your projects: Search in your own codebase and your partner teams' codebases.
trans-unit.target:
By using Code Search you can:
  • Search across all of your projects: Search in your own codebase and your partner teams' codebases.

trans-unit.source: Use cross-project searches over all the code in your Team Services or TFS instance to search across your organization's entire codebase.
trans-unit.target: Use cross-project searches over all the code in your Team Services or TFS instance to search across your organization's entire codebase.

trans-unit.source: Narrow your search by using project, repository, path, file name, and other filter operators.
trans-unit.target: Narrow your search by using project, repository, path, file name, and other filter operators.

trans-unit.source: Use wildcards to widen your search and Boolean operators to fine-tune it.
trans-unit.target: Use wildcards to widen your search and Boolean operators to fine-tune it.

trans-unit.source: • Find specific types of code: Use code type filters to search for specific kinds of code such as definitions, references, functions, comments, strings, namespaces, and more.
trans-unit.target: • Find specific types of code: Use code type filters to search for specific kinds of code such as definitions, references, functions, comments, strings, namespaces, and more.

trans-unit.source: <li>You can use Code Search to narrow down your results to exact code type matches.
trans-unit.target: <li>You can use Code Search to narrow down your results to exact code type matches.

trans-unit.source: Navigate quickly to a method definition to understand its implementation simply by applying the definition filter, or scope the search to references in order to view calls and maximize code reuse.
trans-unit.target: Navigate quickly to a method definition to understand its implementation simply by applying the definition filter, or scope the search to references in order to view calls and maximize code reuse.

trans-unit.source: <li>Easily drill down or widen your search: When you find an item of interest, simply place the cursor on it and use the shortcut menu to quickly search for that text across all your projects and files.
trans-unit.target: <li>Easily drill down or widen your search: When you find an item of interest, simply place the cursor on it and use the shortcut menu to quickly search for that text across all your projects and files.

trans-unit.source: Easily trace how your code works by using the shortcut menu to search for related items such as definitions and references - directly from inside a file.
trans-unit.target: Easily trace how your code works by using the shortcut menu to search for related items such as definitions and references - directly from inside a file.

trans-unit.source: But what happens if you have trouble setting it up?
trans-unit.target: But what happens if you have trouble setting it up?
